mapper.select: SELECT MOVIEINFO.TITLE FROM MOVIEINFO, MOVIERANK WHERE MOVIERANK.MID = MOVIEINFO.MID
SELECT BMAX, BMIN FROM MOVIEINFO WHERE TITLE=#{title};
SELECT COUNT(BPMTEST.MID) AS COUNT FROM BPMTEST, MOVIEINFO WHERE MOVIEINFO.MID = BPMTEST.MID AND MOVIEINFO.TITLE=#{title};
SELECT MOVIELOVE.UID FROM MOVIELOVE,MOVIEINFO,USERINFO WHERE MOVIEINFO.MID = MOVIELOVE.MID AND MOVIELOVE.UID=USERINFO.UID AND MOVIEINFO.TITLE=#{title} AND USERINFO.USERID=#{userId};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MOVIELOVE(UID, MID) SELECT USERINFO.UID, MOVIEINFO.MID FROM MOVIEINFO, USERINFO WHERE USERINFO.USERID=#{userId} AND MOVIEINFO.TITLE=#{title};
INSERT INTO MOVIEINFO(TITLE) SELECT #{title} FROM DUAL WHERE NOT EXISTS(SELECT TITLE FROM MOVIEINFO WHERE TITLE=#{title})
